content: emerald song headband by christina garza-brown inspired by vincent van gogh s painting la ber- ceuse the title translates to lullaby or woman rocking cradle based on the painting itself van gogh was famous for his use of emerald green in his paintings and coincidentally may s birthstone also hap- pens to be the emerald it on- ly seemed fitting that this mother s day inspired pattern be named after this incredible painting knit in tonal hand dyed dk weight yarn the emerald song headband would look best in tonals heathers or yarns with only slight color variations helpful links https //knitfarious com/knitting-101-how-to-long-tail-cast-on/ https //knitfarious com/knitting-101-how-to-knit-the-knit-stitch/ https //knitfarious com/knitting-101-how-to-knit-the-purl-stitch/ https //knitfarious com/knitting-101-how-to-bind-off/ https //knitfarious com/knitting-101-how-much-yarn-for-long-tail-cast-on/ https //knitfarious com/how-to-join-knitting-in-the-round/ https //knitfarious com/knitting-101-how-to-slip-a-stitch/ * credits tech edited by kerry bullock-ozkan this original pattern is intended for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form without my written permission all rights reserved emerald song headband © 2024 by christina garza-brown page 1 knitfarious com all rights reserved emerald song headband finished size one 1 - stitch marker for bor 17 43 cm circumference x 3 75 gauge 9 5 cm height unstretched 10 sts x 18 row = 2 5 cm in stitch pat- fits up to 20 head stretched tern washed and blocked gauge is not materials critical but will affect the finished size a fyberspates vivacious dk 100% and yardage requirements for this pro- merino wool 251 yds / 230 m per ject 4 1 oz / 115g skein in sea green #806 yardage approximate yardage used 60 yds / 55 size u s 6 4 mm 16 40 cm circular m knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge notes this pattern is worked in the round on tapestry needle circular knitting needles slipped stitches all slipped stitches in this pattern are slipped knitwise when slipping stitches be sure to keep gauge loose for best look and fit knitting abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit p purl repeat s repeat s round s round s sl1kw slip 1 stitch knitwise wyif with yarn in front st s stitch es repeat instructions in parenthesis this original pattern is intended for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form without my written permission all rights reserved emerald song headband © 2024 by christina garza-brown page 2 knitfarious com all rights reserved pattern instructions long tail co 87 sts join to knit in the round place marker at bor ribbing 1 round 1 k2 p1 around *repeat round 1 four more times begin working stitch pattern stitch pattern round 1 wyif sl1kw p1 to last st sl1 rnds 2-3 knit around round 4 p1 sl1kw wyif p1 to end rnds 5-6 knit around * repeat rnds 1-6 three more times then repeat round 1 before beginning ribbing 2 ribbing 2 round 1 k2 p1 around *repeat round 1 four more times bobble in pattern
